com.sales.security - package com.sales.security
 
com.sales.services - package com.sales.services
 
configure(HttpSecurity) - Method in class com.sales.security.SecurityConfig
Sets up security which only allows access to pages if user is logged inAlso allows logout functionality.
configureGlobal(AuthenticationManagerBuilder) - Method in class com.sales.security.SecurityConfig
Sets up login functionality with the below credentials on the routes specified in configure Username - user Password - user
Customer - Class in com.sales.models
 
Customer() - Constructor for class com.sales.models.Customer
 
CustomerController - Class in com.sales.controllers
Customer controller which handles all customer functionality
CustomerController() - Constructor for class com.sales.controllers.CustomerController
 
CustomerRepository - Interface in com.sales.repositories
Customer repository which implements methods used to get, save, update and delete data from the MySQL database
CustomerService - Class in com.sales.services
Customer service which handles all database functionality
